name: ConceptDraw DIAGRAM Document
summary: A CDDZ file is a document created by CS Odessa ConceptDraw DIAGRAM, an application used to create diagrams. It contains information about a drawing, such as the placement of text, shapes, and images on a canvas, and also includes diagram settings. ConceptDraw DIAGRAM users create various types of drawings, such as conceptual diagrams or flowcharts, with the software and save them as CDDZ files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
